_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Unnamed List 1 [sn6.10:10.4]: Kokālika's accusation against Sāriputta and Moggallāna
Kokālika's accusation repeated for the second time
Buddha's response to Kokālika's accusation repeated for the second time
Kokālika's accusation repeated for the third time
Buddha's response to Kokālika's accusation repeated for the third time
The stages of Kokālika's illness [sn6.10: Boils the size of mustard seeds
Boils the size of mung beans
Boils the size of jujube seeds
Boils the size of unripe wood apples
Boils the size of ripe wood apples
Bursting of boils and oozing of pus and blood
Rebirth of Kokālika in the Pink Lotus hell
Unnamed List 2 (a causal chain) [sn6.10:: The consequences of speaking bad words
The consequences of hating the holy ones
